title: FORMAT_DATETIME
description: Formats a Date or Datetime as a string.

parameters.name: date/datetime
parameters.description: The Date or Datetime to format.

parameters.name: format_string_optional
parameters.description: The format pattern. Defaults to a standard format if not provided.

parameters.name: timezone_optional
parameters.description: Time zone identifier (e.g., 'America/New_York'). Defaults to the user's local time zone.

examples:
FORMAT_DATETIME(CreatedDate)
-- Returns CreatedDate as a formatted string (e.g., "3/9/2022, 3:06 PM") in user's local time zone.

FORMAT_DATETIME(NOW(), "YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss", "UTC")
-- Returns the current Datetime as a string formatted as "YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss" in UTC.

tips.text: Use a custom format string with the following placeholders: YYYY for year, MM for month, dd for day, hh for hour, mm for minute, and ss for second.
